entities.name: adrian pucey
entities.description: Adrian Pucey is mentioned as the direction of the Bludger, but it changes direction mid-air and targets Harry instead.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: The Bludger is a magical object that is being controlled by Adrian Pucey's direction, but it changes course multiple times to target Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being targeted by the Bludger. He tries to avoid it multiple times and eventually has to fly off at full speed.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George hits the Bludger hard towards Malfoy, but it changes direction again and targets Harry's head.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the target of George's hit on the Bludger, but the Bludger ends up targeting Harry instead.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley waits for the Bludger at the other end and swings at it with all his might, knocking it off course. However, the Bludger still manages to target Harry.

relationships.description: The Bludger is being controlled by Adrian Pucey's direction, but it changes course multiple times to target Harry.
The Bludger targets Harry multiple times throughout the passage, despite changing direction mid-air and being knocked off course by Fred Weasley.
George hits the Bludger hard towards Malfoy, but it changes direction again and targets Harry's head.
Fred Weasley swings at the Bludger with all his might, knocking it off course. However, the Bludger still manages to target Harry.
Harry tries to avoid the Bludger multiple times throughout the passage, but it continues to target him despite his efforts.
